short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sailor Moon wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Sailor Moon background. Sailor Moon wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Sailor Moon wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Sailor Moon background by randomizing or favorite it in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to more theme options.
12. Seamless sharing to social media.
13. Direct download options for wallpapers.
14. Quick links to play games.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, leaves, and fireworks on your Sailor Moon new tab.
